channel.title: Need a flash artist
channel.description:
Hey there
Are you awesome at flash? Can draw like a saint? (assuming the saint went to drawing school)
I need a flash artist that is good at coding it, and even better at drawing it.
post here if you want more info or msg me
*will be contacting whoever seems good enough ones my designs are done*
